评论概述: This is a great quality piece.
评论详情: This is beautifully made. Solid piece. Looks just as pictured. It is a little heavy for staying put in my hair, just wants to slide down. But, I’m still keeping it and feel it is worth it.

This hair clip is very cute. I got this to wear for our company's fundraising event in October in which I am going as a steampunk. It's very nice quality, made of a full metal and not plastic, and especially for the price. It has an alligator clip that may hold my hair, but I plan on using bobby and upins to give it more support. The chains do get tangled easily but it kind of won't matter if it's in my hair, should add to the beauty of it overall.
I loved the quality and good price. I didn't like how long it is , so it didn't work for me.

评论概述: It broke. We need jewelry glue.
评论详情: The Steampunk Craze is everywhere in my wardrobe for Autumn 2023!
It is a very well made hair clip but it is super heavy wouldnt stay in my hair for more then a minute!and I have very thick hair

Stunning piece, love it. Though as others have mentioned the piece is rather heavy so it slides right out of my hair. Though as another also commented, securing it to the pony tail will work just fine.  I am giving it 4/5 stars only because if the heavy weight. I can not wear it as a side clip as I had planned, and can only wear it with the pony tail so that it stays in place.

Loved this, super cute and worked great with my outfit. Only bummer is that it was super heavy and it wouldn't hold my hair. Solution was putting in a small ponytail in, then sliding the clip in the middle of it and latching onto the ponytail. Then it stayed in place!
En ce qui me concerne, je l'ai placé sur un chapeau que j'utilise lors de mes concerts et cela donne un super effet.
Had to piece it together as it was in bits. Beautiful piece, looks lovely on, but the links that hold it together are very weak.
